Surface.Temperature.Min.description: Absolute minimum water temperature of the topmost meter of the ocean water column for the time period.

Surface.Temperature.Max.description: Absolute maximum water temperature of the topmost meter of the ocean water column for the time period.

Surface.Temperature.Mean.description: Average water temperature of the topmost meter of the ocean water column over the time period.

Surface.Temperature.Range.description: Range of water temperatures of the topmost meter of the ocean water column calculated as absolute maximum - absolute minimum over the time period.

Surface.Temperature.Lt.Max.long_name: Maximum Water Temperature of Warmest Month
Surface.Temperature.Lt.Max.description: Long term average of maximum water temperature of the topmost meter of the ocean water column of the warmest month.

Surface.Temperature.Lt.Min.long_name: Minimum Water Temperature of Coldest Month
Surface.Temperature.Lt.Min.description: Long term average of minimum water temperature of the topmost meter of the ocean water column of the coldest month.

Surface.Salinity.Min.description: Absolute minimum water salinity of the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Salinity.Max.description: Absolute maximum water salinity of the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Salinity.Mean.description: Average water salinity of the ocean surface over the time period.

Surface.Salinity.Range.description: Range of water salinity of the ocean surface calculated as absolute maximum - absolute minimum over the time period.

Surface.Salinity.Lt.Min.long_name: Minimum Water Salinity of Freshest Month
Surface.Salinity.Lt.Min.description: Long term average of minimum water salinity of the ocean surface of the freshest month.

Surface.Salinity.Lt.Max.long_name: Maximum Water Salinity of Saltiest Month
Surface.Salinity.Lt.Max.description: Long term average of maximum water salinity of the ocean surface of the saltiest month.

Surface.Current.Velocity.Min.description: Absolute minimum currents velocity at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Current.Velocity.Max.description: Absolute maximum currents velocity at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Current.Velocity.Mean.description: Average currents velocity at the ocean surface over the time period.

Surface.Current.Velocity.Range.description: Range of currents velocity at the ocean surface calculated as absolute maximum - absolute minimum over the time period.

Surface.Current.Velocity.Lt.Max.long_name: Long term average of maximum currents velocity
Surface.Current.Velocity.Lt.Max.description: Long term average of maximum currents velocity at the ocean surface.

Surface.Current.Velocity.Lt.Min.long_name: Long term average of minimum currents velocity
Surface.Current.Velocity.Lt.Min.description: Long term average of minimum currents velocity at the ocean surface.

Surface.Ice.Thickness.Min.description: Absolute minimum ice thickness at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Ice.Thickness.Max.description: Absolute maximum ice thickness at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Ice.Thickness.Mean.description: Average ice thickness at the ocean surface over the time period.

Surface.Ice.Thickness.Range.description: Range of ice thickness at the ocean surface calculated as absolute maximum - absolute minimum over the time period.

Surface.Ice.Thickness.Lt.Max.long_name: Long term average of maximum ice thickness
Surface.Ice.Thickness.Lt.Max.description: Long term average of maximum ice thickness at the ocean surface.

Surface.Ice.Thickness.Lt.Min.long_name: Long term average of minimum ice thickness
Surface.Ice.Thickness.Lt.Min.description: Long term average of minimum ice thickness at the ocean surface.

Surface.Ice.Cover.Min.description: Absolute minimum area of the ocean covered with sea ice relative to total ocean area for the time period.

Surface.Ice.Cover.Max.description: Absolute maximum area of the ocean covered with sea ice relative to total ocean area for the time period.

Surface.Ice.Cover.Mean.description: Average area of the ocean covered with sea ice relative to total ocean area for the time period.

Surface.Ice.Cover.Range.description: Range of area of the ocean covered with sea ice calculated as absolute maximum - absolute minimum over the time period.

Surface.Ice.Cover.Lt.Max.long_name: Long term average of maximum sea ice concentration
Surface.Ice.Cover.Lt.Max.description: Long term average of maximum area of the ocean covered with sea ice relative to total ocean area.

Surface.Ice.Cover.Lt.Min.long_name: Long term average of minimum sea ice concentration
Surface.Ice.Cover.Lt.Min.description: Long term average of minimum area of the ocean covered with sea ice relative to total ocean area.

Surface.Diffuse.Attenuation.Min.description: Minimum diffuse attenuation at the ocean surface for the time period. This is an indicator of water clarity, expressing how deeply visible light in the blue to the green region of the spectrum penetrates into the water column.

Surface.Diffuse.Attenuation.Max.description: Maximum diffuse attenuation at the ocean surface for the time period. This is an indicator of water clarity, expressing how deeply visible light in the blue to the green region of the spectrum penetrates into the water column.

Surface.Diffuse.Attenuation.Mean.description: Average diffuse attenuation at the ocean surface for the time period. This is an indicator of water clarity, expressing how deeply visible light in the blue to the green region of the spectrum penetrates into the water column.

Surface.Cloud.Cover.Min.description: Minimum percentage of the earth covered by clouds over the time period.

Surface.Cloud.Cover.Max.description: Maximum percentage of the earth covered by clouds over the time period.

Surface.Cloud.Cover.Mean.description: Average percentage of the earth covered by clouds over the time period.

Surface.Nitrate.Min.description: Absolute minimum nitrate concentration at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Nitrate.Max.description: Absolute maximum nitrate concentration at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Nitrate.Mean.description: Average nitrate concentration at the ocean surface over the time period.

Surface.Nitrate.Range.description: Range of nitrate concentration at the ocean surface calculated as absolute maximum - absolute minimum over the time period.

Surface.Nitrate.Lt.Max.long_name: Long term average of maximum nitrate concentration
Surface.Nitrate.Lt.Max.description: Long term average of maximum nitrate concentration at the ocean surface.

Surface.Nitrate.Lt.Min.long_name: Long term average of minimum nitrate concentration
Surface.Nitrate.Lt.Min.description: Long term average of minimum nitrate concentration at the ocean surface.

Surface.Silicate.Max.description: Absolute maximum silicate concentration at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Silicate.Mean.description: Average silicate concentration at the ocean surface over the time period.

Surface.Silicate.Range.description: Range of silicate concentration at the ocean surface calculated as absolute maximum - absolute minimum over the time period.

Surface.Dissolved.Oxygen.Mean.description: Average oxygen dissolved concentration at the ocean surface over the time period.

Surface.Dissolved.Oxygen.Range.description: Range of dissolved oxygen concentration at the ocean surface calculated as absolute maximum - absolute minimum over the time period.

Surface.Calcite.Mean.description: Average calcite (CaCO3) concentration at the ocean surface over the time period.

Surface.Chlorophyll.Max.description: Absolute maximum chlorophyll A concentration at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Chlorophyll.Mean.description: Average chlorophyll A concentration at the ocean surface over the time period.

Surface.Chlorophyll.Range.description: Range of chlorophyll A concentration at the ocean surface calculated as absolute maximum - absolute minimum over the time period.

Surface.Chlorophyll.Lt.Max.long_name: Long term average of maximum chlorophyll A concentration

Surface.Phytoplankton.Min.description: Absolute minimum phytoplankton concentration expressed as carbon at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Phytoplankton.Max.description: Absolute maximum phytoplankton concentration expressed as carbon at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Phytoplankton.Mean.description: Average phytoplankton concentration expressed as carbon at the ocean surface over the time period.

Surface.Phytoplankton.Range.description: Range of phytoplankton concentration expressed as carbon at the ocean surface calculated as absolute maximum - absolute minimum over the time period.

Surface.Phytoplankton.Lt.Max.long_name: Long term average of maximum phytoplankton concentration
Surface.Phytoplankton.Lt.Max.description: Long term average of maximum phytoplankton concentration expressed as carbon at the ocean surface.

Surface.Phytoplankton.Lt.Min.description: Long term average of minimum phytoplankton concentration expressed as carbon at the ocean surface.

Surface.Primary.Productivity.Min.description: Absolute minimum net primary productivity of carbon at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Primary.Productivity.Max.description: Absolute maximum net primary productivity of carbon at the ocean surface for the time period.

Surface.Primary.Productivity.Mean.description: Average net primary productivity of carbon at the ocean surface over the time period.

Surface.Primary.Productivity.Range.description: Range of net primary productivity of carbon at the ocean surface calculated as absolute maximum - absolute minimum over the time period.

Surface.Primary.Productivity.Lt.Max.long_name: Long term average of maximum primary productivity
Surface.Primary.Productivity.Lt.Max.description: Long term average of maximum net primary productivity of carbon at the ocean surface.

Surface.Primary.Productivity.Lt.Min.long_name: Long term average of minimum primary productivity
Surface.Primary.Productivity.Lt.Min.description: Long term average of minimum net primary productivity of carbon at the ocean surface.

Surface.Ph.description: Average pH of the ocean surface for the time period. pH is an indicator of the acidity in the ocean, with lower values indicating more acid conditions and higher values more alkaline conditions.

Surface.Par.Max.description: Maximum Photosynthetically Available Radiation (PAR) at the ocean surface for the time period. PAR indicates the quantum energy flux from the sun in the spectral range 400-700 nm reaching the ocean surface.

Surface.Par.Mean.description: Mean Photosynthetically Available Radiation  at the ocean surface for the time period. PAR indicates the quantum energy flux from the sun in the spectral range 400-700 nm reaching the ocean surface.
